summary.p: Comander cannot write much because the messenger [...] is in a hurry, but only because he wants to meet Bullinger! He will share noteworthy information from Lombardy and Italy. The people of Zurich should convey the news they have learned.

div.p: Grace and peace from the Lord. I do not have time to write, the messenger is in a hurry, dearest Bullinger, but only so that he may have the opportunity to meet you. He himself knows better than I do whatever is worth knowing from Lombardy and all of Italy and will recount everything by word of mouth. Write to us about what you have learned in Zurich.
Farewell and extend our greetings to all the brothers.
To the most distinguished man, Master Heinrich Bullinger, bishop of the city of Zurich, his lord and foremost friend.
